DataElement.preferredName: Patient  EGFR Activating Mutation Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Status
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the status of whether a subject is suitable for enrollment in a study according to a patient's tumor containing EGFR activating mutations.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient  EGFR Activating Mutation Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care._A somatic mutation of the epidermal growth factor receptor gene which encodes a 170kDa transmembrane protein, a short transmembrane region, and an intracellular domain._Elements of a personal medical history which are necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: EGFR Activating Mutation Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: A somatic mutation of the epidermal growth factor receptor gene which encodes a 170kDa transmembrane protein, a short transmembrane region, and an intracellular domain.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: A somatic mutation of the epidermal growth factor receptor gene which encodes a constitutively active 170kDa transmembrane protein, a short transmembrane region, and an intracellular domain.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

DataElementConcept.origin: ECOG CRF:Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group Case Report Form
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 9/28/15 edit to definition draft new DEC and released/tt.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Patient's tumor must have act
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient's tumor must have activating mutations of EGFR (del 19, L858R) by MATCH NGS assay.
